From where did you get to know about this NGO ?

Welcome to NGO Connect App â€“ A testament to passion, innovation, and a shared commitment to making a difference.Founded by Android developer , Shrushti Nagar and Rahul Mukati ,NGO Connect is more than just an app; it\'s a bridge connecting individuals with the noble cause of philanthropy.

At NGO Connect, our mission is clear : To bridge the gap between those who wish to donate, seek help, or volunteer and the deserving NGOs that make a positive impact on our world. We believe in the power of technology to amplify acts of kindness and streamline the process of connecting those who want to make a difference with organizations that need their support .

A passionate Android Developer who excels at UI/UX designing and give creative outlook to the ideas. I am an Upcoming Software Engineer with utmost potential to make a difference with my strong creative skills.

An Enthusiastic Android Developer proficient in Kotlin. Approaching Software Engineer, who is poised with ideas and a blend of innovation, courage and unwavering commitment to transform these ideas into digital realities.
Don\'t Have an Account ? Click here

Your contribution directly supports vital programs, covers operational needs, and establishes an emergency fund for unforeseen circumstances. We prioritize transparency and will provide regular updates on the impact of your donation. Thank you for being a catalyst for positive change.
